summary: A strange enchanter was unearthed from the depths of Labyrinthian, who's enchanting table is this?
descriptionHtml:
[b][u][font=Courier New][size=5]Overview[/size][/font][/u][/b]

A custom enchanting table that I threw together when I was bored, this is a resource file that anyone can use as they desire. The only thing I ask is to be given credit as its original creator.

[b][u][font=Courier New][size=5]Install/Uninstall[/size][/font][/u][/b]

To [b]install[/b] the mod:
1- Download Magnus' Enchanter
2- Put the ESP and BSA in the proper Skyrim Directory (if you want to see the model in game)
3- Use the mesh supplied as a resource

To [b]uninstall[/b] the mod:
1- Save your game outside the Hall of the Elements
2- Delete the ESP and BSA

[b][u][font=Courier New][size=5]FAQ[/size][/font][/u][/b]

Q: What is the ESP for?
A: Its sole purpose is to showcase the enchanter in-game. The enchanter can be found at the College of Winterhold in the Hall of the Elements.

[b][u][font=Courier New][size=5]Resource Used In[/size][/font][/u][/b]

[b][i][size=2]Frost Haven Temple[/size][/i][/b] by Moore - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71149/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71149/[/url]
[i]"Medium Sized Snow Elf house embedded in the ice just north of the Wreck of the Winter War. Comes with all the usual crafting amenities, room to adopt up to 6 children and its own merchants."[/i]

[b][i][size=2]Shumer and the Fall of Allagard[/size][/i][/b] by agerweb - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60829/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60829/[/url]
[i]"Explore the ever expanding new world Shumer and discover it's mysteries and secrets."[/i]

[b][i][size=2]Riverside Lodge REDUX[/size][/i][/b] by Lupus78 and Sessine - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72434/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72434/[/url]
[i]"A Hearthfire-style buildable riverside lodge with all amenities located seamlessly between Riverwood and Whiterun. Based on Lupus78's Riverside Lodge Mod."[/i]

[b][i][size=2]Atronach Forge Minions[/size][/i][/b] by alanovichromanov - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64170/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64170/[/url]
[i]"Adds new creatures that can be summoned to fight for you."

[/i][b][i][size=2]Relics of Hyrule[/size][/i][/b] by JKalenad - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40615/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40615/[/url]
[i]"Enrich your Skyrim experience with loads of new weapons, armor, spells and dungeons that pay homage to the Zelda universe, linking it to Elder Scrolls lore in a respectful way."

[/i][b][i][size=2]Winterbrook Cottage[/size][/i][/b] by polferrera - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73413/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73413/[/url]
[i]"This mod brings a new stormcloak themed player home into the Winterhold mountains, southeast of Dawnstar."
[/i]
[size=2][i][b]Igloo[/b][/i][/size]by Sonogu - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64744/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64744/[/url]
[i]"A small Igloo house for the people who like the harsh weather in the northern areas. Get ready to freeze..."
[/i]
[b][i][size=2]Little Cottage[/size][/i][/b] by Faelrin - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64671/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64671/[/url]
[i]"This adds a little cottage located in the pine forest near Half-Moon Mill, Hunter's Rest, and Moss Mother Cavern."[/i]

[center][font=Courier New][size=5]***Mod Cleaned With TesVEdit***[/size][/font][/center]
author: Antonio Colasurdo
